fields.title: Riyad as-Salihin (The Gardens of the Righteous)
fields.description: A renowned collection of authentic hadiths compiled by Imam An-Nawawi. This book covers various aspects of Islamic ethics, worship, manners, and daily life, making it essential for anyone seeking to implement the teachings of the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ.

fields.title: Sahih al-Bukhari
fields.description: The most authentic collection of hadith compiled by Imam Bukhari. It includes narrations on beliefs, worship, ethics, law, and much more from the life and teachings of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ.

fields.title: Python Crash Course
fields.description: A beginner-friendly introduction to Python programming. Covers the basics and then builds projects like games and web apps. Ideal for students and self-learners.

fields.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
fields.description: A classic in the world of software development, this book offers valuable insights, tools, and techniques to become a better programmer.

fields.title: Advanced English Grammar – Martin Hewings
fields.description: A comprehensive guide to advanced grammar concepts for learners of English, widely used by students preparing for exams like IELTS and TOEFL.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone – J.K. Rowling
fields.description: The first book in the Harry Potter series introduces the world of magic, Hogwarts, and the beginning of an epic adventure.
